title: Former ServiceLink Sales Executive Joins National Lender Embrace Home Loans
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Embrace Home Loans 
NEWPORT, R.I. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Embrace Home Loans , a prominent leader in the mortgage industry, announced today that John McGinty, former national sales executive of ServiceLink, a Black Knight company, has joined the national lender as its Southeast regional lending executive. In his new role, McGinty will head all retail sales production and recruiting efforts in the Southeast region. 
As a company that values a customer-centric approach to lending, Embrace has become an industry leader by enhancing the customer experience. With unique processes such as its Quick Close 7 and Approved to Move Embrace can clear a borrower to close in seven business days. This, along with keeping everyone up to date on the status, ensures constant communication with borrowers, which consistently results in a 98 percent customer satisfaction rating. Furthermore, the national lender has won several employer-of-choice awards and continues to increase its sales force. 
“The mortgage industry is in a state of significant transformation,” said McGinty. “With this being such an exciting time, I was eager to return to the lending side of the house, and Embrace was the perfect fit for me.” 
Most recently, McGinty was responsible for developing wealth management and high net worth sales strategies for ServiceLink. He has also held senior sales management roles at JP Morgan Chase, Fifth Third Bank and CitiMortgage. 
“With more than 20 years in the mortgage industry, John brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to Embrace,” said Jeff McGuiness, Chief Sales Officer, Embrace Home Loans. “His leadership will be invaluable to our long-term success. John has a proven track record of building highly effective retail sales organizations and we’re excited to have him become part of our team.” 
About Embrace Home Loans 
Founded in 1983, Embrace Home Loans is a direct lender for Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, approved by FHA and VA, and an issuer for Ginnie Mae. Embrace Home Loans has remained a prominent leader in the industry, having helped hundreds of thousands of individuals and their families purchase new homes, lower their monthly payments and consolidate high-interest debt since its inception. Operating 40+ offices across 46 states, Embrace has been recognized seven times as one of the Best Medium-sized Companies to Work for in America by Fortune , four times as one of the Fastest Growing Companies in America by Inc ., and recognized as the Most Community Involved Company in Rhode Island by Providence Business News .
